main_definition: Changed means to have undergone a transformation or alteration, resulting in a new state or condition.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To make something different from what it was before
meanings_and_examples.example: She changed her mind about attending the party.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To alter or modify clothing or accessories to fit better or suit one's style
meanings_and_examples.example: I had my jeans tailored and they finally fit perfectly.

meanings_and_examples.definition: When referring to time, it means that a certain period has passed since an event occurred
meanings_and_examples.example: It has been changed three years since we last saw each other.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To make a different choice or decision in response to new information or circumstances
meanings_and_examples.example: After the accident, he decided to change his route for safety reasons.

meanings_and_examples.definition: When used with colors, it means making a color lighter by adding white
meanings_and_examples.example: She changed the blue paint into light sky blue by mixing in some white.
